thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hunan TV and Broadcast Intermediary sees FY 2017 net profit to down 88.3 pct to 92.2 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hunan TV and Broadcast Intermediary sees FY 2017 net profit to down 88.3 pct to 92.2 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - hunan tv & broadcast intermediary co ltd

text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Hunan TV & Broadcast Intermediary Co Ltd :
* Sees net profit for FY 2017 to decrease by 88.3 percent to 92.2 percent, compared to net profit of FY 2016 (333.1 million yuan)
* Says decrease in revenue and profit of cable TV service as main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Q2P3cS
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
